name: Flying Pig
lore:
&8Consumed on use

&aPet Items &7can boost pets in many powerful ways!
&7A pet can only hold one &aPet Item &7at a time.
&7The pet must be &evisible &7to apply the item!

&7&7Grants your pig pet the ability to fly
&7while on your private island and
&7garden! You also don't need to hold
&7a carrot on a stick to control your
&7pig.

&7&eRight-click on your summoned pet to
&egive it this item!

&a&lUNCOMMON PET ITEM&r
